channel.title: Google News
channel.description: A scraped RSS feed for the Google News En Telegram Channel

item.title: 2023-07-07T14:42:31
item.description:
Gboard will have a new undo feature.

The latest beta version introduces a hidden undo_access_point flag, which, when enabled, brings a new "undo" button to the access point bar. This will help you undo any action, including deleting part or whole word, or selecting one of the tooltip options.

The keyboard remembers the entire history of the current text field and can undo actions up to the originally blank line.

H/T: Rboard Themes

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-07-05T19:59:31

item.title: 2023-07-04T13:21:26
item.description:
Google Photos video editor now offers a new Effects tab.

When editing a video, you'll see a new tab that presents 12 effects: Dust mix, Paper tear, B&W Film, Lomo, Light leak, Film mood, Chromatic, Fish-eye, Vintage, Layouts, Retro film and Poster.

This tool starts to appear to users through the server side update.

H/T: Emad Hussien from üîó In Depth Tech Reviews YouTube channel.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-07-03T17:23:06
item.description:
The first live shots of the Pixel 8 Pro test prototype.

A Reddit user posted on r/GooglePixel images of an engineering sample of the Pixel 8 Pro, which he says he received them ‚Äúfrom the device team in Google for testing.‚Äù He quickly deleted his post, but Droid-Life managed to save the images.

Here, we can see the back and front sides of the smartphone. On the bootloader screen, we can notice the already known codename "husky", as well as the presence of 12GB of Samsung LPDDR5 RAM and 128GB of storage.

The Tensor G3 is known to be referred to by the codename "zuma", which is mentioned here on the back of this test device.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-07-01T21:56:15
item.description:
Google Lens starts to roll out a light / dark theme.

The amoled-black background will now be replaced by a white fill in the light theme and a dark grey fill in the dark theme. And the current page indicator pill will be baseline blue instead of white, which is *probably* the company's way of laying the groundwork for the future implementation of dynamic colors.

This change could be seen for the first time on the company's blog, where it announced a new ability to search for skin conditions.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-07-01T21:47:05
item.description:
Google Calendar is the next app to receive Material 3 Switches.

Along with the app update to version 2023.26.0-543240418, you'll see an updated switch component from the Material Design 3 library on the settings and event/task creation pages.

Previously, new switches appeared in Google Keep and Password Manager.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-07-01T12:41:40
item.description:
New leak on Google Pixel 8: battery capacity, charging speeds, Wi-Fi 7 support and more.

Thanks to a source inside Google, Kamila Wojciechowska (via üîó Android Authority) has shared new info about the upcoming Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro:

‚Ä¢ Battery capacity:
‚óã Pixel 8: 4,485mAh
‚óã Pixel 8 Pro: 4,950mAh

‚Ä¢ Wired charging speeds:
‚óã Pixel 8: 24W
‚óã Pixel 8 Pro: 27W

‚Ä¢ Wireless charging speeds:
‚óã Pixel 8: 20W (proprietary); 12W (Qi);
‚óã Pixel 8 Pro: 23W (proprietary); 12W (Qi);

‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi 7 support ‚Äî Pixel 8 and 8 Pro will be equipped with the updated Broadcom BCM4398 Bluetooth/Wi-Fi communications chip that supports Wi-Fi 7. The new standard is based on Wi-Fi 6 and 6E and provides improved speeds, latency and reliability, while maintaining backward compatibility with older standards.

‚Ä¢ Ultra-wideband support remains exclusive to the Pro version of the smartphone. An upgraded module will be used.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-30T10:19:55
item.description:
Google Play now has a blue accent.

At the beginning of March I made a post that "Play Store is finally works on fully integrating the Material You dynamic colors". This was half true. Back then, the only accent was "baseline blue", which replaced green, and also overrides the accent on the main page. And nothing has changed since then.

Now wherever there was a green accent, there will be blue, including on the homepage, where there used to be dynamic colors. This essentially lays the groundwork for integrating dynamic colors throughout the app, as all colours (on the homepage and other pages) are now in sync.

So don't be surprised that Play Store no longer follows the system colors on the home page.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-24T10:29:02
item.description:
Google Pixel 8 leak points to desktop mode support.

Thanks to a source inside Google, Kamila Wojciechowska (via üîó Android Authority) has revealed support for an alternative USB DisplayPort mode that will appear in the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro. This will allow the phone to be used as a desktop replacement using the USB-C port.

The feature is similar to Samsung's DeX technology introduced in 2017, which allows desktop mode to be launched using a USB-C cable or HDMI adapter. In addition, hints of desktop mode as well as USB-C DisplayPort Alt Mode support (via Mishaal Rahman) are also present in Android 14, on which the Pixel 8 is due out.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-21T16:57:42
item.description:
Made by Google has released a series of videos demonstrating the Pixel's advantages over the iPhone.

The series of short videos, titled 'Best Phones Forever', showed "what happens when two phones stop being rivals and start being friends?"

It particularly highlights Google Pixel's camera capabilities, Google Photos' 'Unblur' and 'Magic Eraser' features, Google One's built-in VPN and Reverse Wireless Charging. And the Pixel Fold made the iPhone swoon.

In my opinion, it turned out quite funny :)

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-21T15:02:01
item.description:
Here's a demo of the redesigned Google Weather UI on phones.

The redesign is currently exclusive to the Pixel Tablet, and I've managed to enable it on the latest version of the Google Search app by spoofing the device's code name to 'tangorpro' (Pixel Tablet).

The UI is now presented as a single feed consisting of current weather, hourly forecast, 10-day forecast and detailed current weather at the very bottom. Clicking on one of the days will open a separate page with detailed weather information and the ability to switch between them in a carousel at the top.

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-20T20:40:41
item.description:

üîó Explanation and demo

Google News | En

item.title: 2023-06-20T20:38:56
item.description:
Pixel Tablet screensavers can run on any device with Android 13. But it's not all that simple.

The Pixel Tablet inherits the Nest Hub's informative screensavers with clocks, weather and photos. A special 'Dreams' app (com.google.assistant.hubui) is responsible for this. When the tablet is docked, one of the pre-selected screensavers is automatically activated.

The APK of the 'Dreams' app can be installed on any device with Android 13 and the relevant screensavers will appear under 'Settings/Display/Screensavers'. Here you can also set the screensaver enable on charge.

From my experience, only the Frog, 4 clock options and Weather (50/50) are functional. Also, they don't show info the way it looks on the Pixel Tablet.

‚ùóÔ∏èThese screensavers are optimised for tablets and may not display correctly on phones.

Google News | En
